## LogoutActionPayload interface

Represents an action payload used to logout the current user

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface LogoutActionPayload 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [refreshToken?](./state-auth.logoutactionpayload.refreshtoken.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The refresh token so external api can clean up old tokens |
|  [returnUrl?](./state-auth.logoutactionpayload.returnurl.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> A return url used if the user logs in again |
